item.title: Wristcheck App
item.description: WristCheck App # Version 1.0.0 is live! # I’m pleased to announce that I’ve just released my first fully released app on both Android and iOS! (If you’re browsing around you may see I have previously posted about the ReboundMTB app, however this was never fully released!). What is WristCheck? # WristCheck is a digital watch box, so if you’re both a) a watch collector, and b) a nerd, then this post might interest you!
